intro.title: Every Service, Every Detail, Every Price
intro.subtitle: We offer a high quality service because the funeral directors you choose should do everything for you. We also believe in complete transparency. Below you'll find comprehensive information about each of our services, including everything that's included and clear pricing for optional extras. No hidden fees, no surprises.
intro.credentials: With over 75 years of experience and memberships in NAFD, SAIF, and the Association of Green Funeral Directors, we maintain the highest professional standards while keeping our services accessible and affordable.

traditional.title: Bespoke Funeral Service
traditional.fullDescription: Our bespoke funeral service honours time-tested customs while allowing for personal touches that reflect your loved one's life. This comprehensive service includes professional care from the moment you contact us through to the final farewell. We handle all arrangements with dignity and respect, ensuring every detail meets your family's expectations. Our experienced team guides you through each decision, from choosing the right coffin to selecting music and readings that capture the essence of your loved one's life. The traditional service typically includes a viewing at our chapel of rest, a formal procession to the service venue or crematorium, and support with the reception afterwards. Options can be added or removed. Use our flexible Funeral Estimator to help check any costs here Barringtons Funeral Calculator
included: Professional services of funeral director and staff
Collection and care of your loved one (24/7 availability)
Traditional oak veneer coffin with quality fittings
Use of chapel of rest for viewing
Order of service sheets (up to 50 copies)
Online memorial page and donations collection

contemporary.title: Contemporary Celebration of Life
contemporary.fullDescription: A modern celebration of life focuses on joy, memories, and the unique personality of your loved one. This service breaks away from traditional constraints, allowing complete personalization of every element. Whether it's a themed celebration reflecting their passions, a gathering at their favorite venue, or a service filled with their beloved music, we help create a farewell that truly celebrates who they were. Our contemporary services often include multimedia tributes, personalized decorations, and unique touches like memory tables, photo displays, or even live performances. We work closely with celebrants who specialize in creating meaningful, non-religious ceremonies that capture the spirit of your loved one. Use our flexible Funeral Estimator to help check any costs here Barringtons Funeral Calculator
included: Professional services and personalized planning consultation
Collection and care of your loved one
Choice of cardboard contemporary coffin or casket
Memory table and photo display setup

optional.name: VW camper or vintage car hearse

direct.title: Direct Cremation
direct.fullDescription: Direct cremation is a simple, dignified option without a traditional funeral service. This choice is increasingly popular for those who prefer privacy, simplicity, or plan to hold a memorial service at a later date. Despite being our most affordable option, we maintain the same high standards of care and respect. Your loved one is cared for in our funeral home, and you can arrange a viewing if desired as an additional option. The cremation takes place at a time chosen by the crematorium, without attendees, and the ashes are returned to you afterwards. This allows complete flexibility in how and when you choose to remember your loved one, whether through a memorial service, ash scattering ceremony, or private family gathering.
included: Collection from place of death (within 20 miles)
Return of ashes in standard container

optional.name: Attended viewing, including dressing visiting for up to 1.5hours - maybe play some music, have a cup of tea

green.title: Green & Natural Funeral
green.fullDescription: Our green funeral service reflects a commitment to environmental sustainability while providing a meaningful farewell. We work with natural burial grounds across Merseyside and beyond, offering beautiful woodland or meadow settings for a final resting place. Every aspect of the service minimizes environmental impact, from biodegradable coffins made from bamboo, willow, or recycled materials, to our electric hearse option. As members of the Association of Green Funeral Directors, we plant a memorial tree for every funeral we conduct. The service can be religious or non-religious, formal or informal, but always respects both your loved one and the environment they cherished. Use our flexible Funeral Estimator to help check any costs here Barringtons Funeral Calculator
included: Collection in electric or hybrid vehicle
Memorial tree planted in their memory
green.commitment: We offset all carbon emissions from our services and contribute to local conservation projects. Every green funeral includes lifetime membership to the natural burial ground for family visits.

religious.title: Religious & Faith Services
religious.fullDescription: We understand the importance of honoring religious traditions and customs during times of loss. Our religious funeral services are conducted with deep respect for faith-specific requirements, whether Catholic, Protestant, Jewish, Islamic, Hindu, Buddhist, or other beliefs. We work closely with religious leaders from all communities to ensure every ritual and tradition is properly observed. Our team is experienced in managing the specific timings, preparations, and ceremonial requirements of different faiths. From Tahara in Jewish tradition to Hindu cremation rites, from Islamic burial requirements to Buddhist chanting ceremonies, we ensure your loved one's faith is honored throughout their final journey. Use our flexible Funeral Estimator to help check any costs here Barringtons Funeral Calculator
included: Liaison with religious leaders and places of worship
Faith-specific preparation of your loved one
Professional pallbearers familiar with religious customs

home.title: Home Funeral Care
home.fullDescription: A home funeral allows your loved one to rest in familiar surroundings, giving family and friends the opportunity for private farewells in a comfortable, personal setting. This traditional practice is seeing renewed interest from families who want more time and privacy to say goodbye. We provide all necessary equipment and support to make this possible, including cooling equipment to allow your loved one to rest at home safely for several days. Our team offers 24/7 telephone support and can visit to ensure everything is arranged properly. This option can be combined with any type of funeral service, allowing the procession to begin from home rather than the funeral parlor. Use our flexible Funeral Estimator to help check any costs here Barringtons Funeral Calculator
included: Preparation of your loved one for home viewing
Delivery and setup of cooling equipment
Supply of candles and memorial items

additional.title: Additional Services & Support
additional.subtitle: Complete your arrangements with these optional services, each designed to add meaningful touches to the farewell

direct_cremation.title: Direct Cremation
direct_cremation.description: A simple, dignified option without a traditional funeral service. Perfect for those who prefer simplicity or plan to hold a memorial service at a later date. Complete flexibility for how and when you remember your loved one.

stationery.title: Memorial Stationery
stationery.description: Custom-designed order of service booklets, memorial cards, attendance cards, and thank you notes. All items can be personalized with photos, poems, and special messages.

floral.title: Floral Tributes
floral.description: Beautiful arrangements from local florists including traditional wreaths, contemporary designs, and symbolic tributes. We can also arrange charitable donations in lieu of flowers.

memorial.title: Memorial Keepsakes
memorial.description: Fingerprint jewelry, memorial diamonds, photo albums, memory bears from clothing, and other precious keepsakes to treasure forever.

streaming.title: Live Streaming
streaming.description: Professional webcasting allows distant family and friends to attend the service virtually. Includes recording for later viewing and sharing.

music.title: Live Music
music.description: Professional musicians including organists, soloists, bagpipers, harpists, or contemporary performers to provide meaningful music during the service.

transport.title: Special Transport
transport.description: Alternative hearses including motorcycle, horse-drawn, vintage cars, lorries, or other vehicles that reflect your loved one's interests.

monuments.title: Memorials & Headstones
monuments.description: Design and installation of headstones, plaques, and monuments. We work with skilled craftspeople to create lasting tributes in stone, bronze, or other materials.

aftercare.title: Bereavement Support
aftercare.description: Ongoing support including grief counseling referrals, support group information, and practical assistance with estate matters.

payment.title: Flexible Payment Options

immediate.title: Immediate Payment
immediate.description: Payment in full by cash, cheque, or card. We accept all major credit and debit cards. Full payment is typically due within 14 days of the funeral.

installment.title: Payment Plans
installment.description: Spread the cost over 6 or 12 months with our instalment plans. Subject to approval, with competitive interest rates and no hidden fees.

prepaid.title: Prepaid Funeral Plans
prepaid.description: Lock in today's prices and spare your family from financial worry. Flexible payment terms available from 12 to 120 months.

payment.note: We understand this is a difficult time financially as well as emotionally. Please speak to us about any concerns - we'll always try to find a solution that works for your family.
